details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.1.7 Stream objects - 6.1.7.1 General - Keywords spacing
details.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED (0Ah) character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker.

rule.description: The stream keyword shall be followed either by a CARRIAGE RETURN (0Dh) and LINE FEED (0Ah) character sequence or by a single LINE FEED (0Ah) character. The endstream keyword shall be preceded by an EOL marker.

error.message: Extra spacings or missing EOL characters around keywords 'stream' and 'endstream'
